## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
#CASO: Tiempo de hospitalización vs. Edad del paciente

# Datos
edad <- c(25,30,35,40,45,50,55,60,65,70,75,80)
dias <- c(2,3,4,4,5,6,7,7,8,9,9,10)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
# Crear dataframe
datos <- data.frame(edad, dias)
```

```{r}
# Regresión lineal
modelo <- lm(dias ~ edad, data = datos)
```

```{r}
# Resumen del modelo
summary(modelo)
```

```{r}
# Gráfico
plot(edad, dias,
     main = "Relación entre edad y días hospitalizado",
     xlab = "Edad del paciente",
     ylab = "Días hospitalizado")
abline(modelo, col="blue", lwd=2) 
```
